name: 2K Pop!
description:
2K Pop! is a crazy dynamic mix of your favorite 2048 with bubble shooter game.

Shoot at the bubbles with the same number, merge them up to 2K (2048) to blow it and nearby bubbles. Blow the bubbles fast enough and hit the high score!

Complete the challenges to unlock more beautiful and stylish colors for the balls and the background.

Beautiful graphics, dynamic gameplay and perfect sounds!
